discovery_questions.eating_habits: I like to scroll on social media to unwind
discovery_questions.free_time: mostly evening, but also can be throughout the day. It's typically about 2-4 hours longer than I should spend though

It feels pretty realistic just aim for it 3 times, same as my sleep goal same days as my sleep goal, since i feel like doing less social media time will inherently help me hit my sleep goal

chat_history.content: [START_SESSION]
Hey Taiyo, welcome back! It's great to see you again for our second session. How was your week?
it was good!
That's wonderful to hear! So, how did it go with your goal of improving your sleep and trying to hit your schedule for 3 nights out of the week?
i was able to hit it every night of the 3 nights!
That's fantastic, Taiyo! You set out to hit your sleep schedule 3 nights this week and you did exactly that. That must feel really good. On a scale of 1 to 10, how stressed were you this week?
Thanks for sharing that. I noticed your stress level stayed about the same as last week at 5 out of 10. What do you think contributed most to that stress level this week?
my homework for sure

Homework can definitely add pressure. Now that you've had success with your sleep goal this week, let's think about what you want to focus on for next week. You have three options: you could stick with the same sleep goal, keep working on sleep and add something new like managing homework stress, or focus on completely different goals. What feels right for you?
I'd like to stick with the same sleep goal, but I also want to add a new goal - cutting time off from scrolling on social media

Great, so you want to keep working on your sleep schedule and also cut down on social media scrolling. Let's make that social media goal more specific. When you say cutting time off from scrolling, how much time do you typically spend on social media now, and how much would you like to reduce it by?
6-8 hours every day, and I want to cut it to 3 tops. This would also help with getting more sleep

Wow, cutting from 6-8 hours down to 3 hours is a big jump. That's reducing your screen time by more than half in just one week. How realistic does that feel for you, especially while managing homework stress?
it feels pretty realistic
Let me make sure I understand your goal correctly. You want to limit your social media scrolling to a maximum of 3 hours per day, down from your current 6-8 hours. Is that what you mean by 3 tops?
yeah

Perfect. So your goal is to limit social media scrolling to 3 hours maximum per day. How many days this week do you want to hit that 3-hour limit - every day, or would you like to start with a few days to see how it goes?
just aim for it 3 times, same as my sleep goal
Got it, so you want to limit social media to 3 hours maximum on 3 days this week. Which three days are you thinking - would you want to try the same days as your sleep goal, or different days?
same days as my sleep goal, since i feel like doing less social media time will inherently help me hit my sleep goal

That makes a lot of sense - tackling both goals on the same days so they support each other. Just to clarify, which specific three days of the week are those? Like Monday, Wednesday, Friday, or which days work best for you?
MWF
Perfect. So your goal is to limit social media scrolling to 3 hours maximum on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday this week. On a scale of 1 to 10, how confident are you that you can achieve this goal?

A 7 is a solid confidence level - it shows you believe in yourself while being realistic about the challenge. Since you're working on both limiting social media and improving sleep on the same days, you've set yourself up well for success with goals that reinforce each other.
yeah

Great. So just to make sure I have everything right - this week you're working on two goals: getting more sleep on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday nights, and limiting social media to 3 hours max on those same three days. Does that capture it accurately?
yes
Perfect. Now that we've got your goals set for this week, I'm curious - what do you think will be your biggest challenge in sticking to these goals?
just hitting it consistently, which I'll set app limits on my phone to make sure i hit the goals

Setting app limits is a smart move - that'll give you that extra nudge when you need it. How will you track whether you hit your goals on those three days each week, so we can celebrate your progress at our next session?
I'll track it via paper and pen

That works well. Alright Taiyo, you're all set with your two goals for this week - improving your sleep and limiting social media to 3 hours on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday. I'm looking forward to hearing how it goes when we meet again next week. Take care.
thanks!
You're welcome, Taiyo! See you next week.
